hiya_tip: The audio file duration should be between 2 seconds and 5 minutes.
hiya_voice_recording_detection_rating_4: This is very likely to be a voice recording
hiya_voice_recording_detection_rating_3: This is likely to be a voice recording
hiya_error_generic: An error happened. Please try again or try a different audio
hiya_error_timeout: The request timed out. The server took too long to respond.
hiya_error_unable_to_read_file: Unable to read the audio file. Please try with a different file.
error_invalid_audio_file: Invalid audio file format: this file format is not supported. Please try again with a different audio file.
error_invalid_media_file: Invalid media file type. Please try again using an audio file.
error_invalid_file: Invalid File. Please try again using an audio file.
hiya_voice_cloning_detection_rating: Result: Hiya.com considers this audio fragment as
hiya_voice_cloning_detection_rating_2: likely not AI-generated. The absence of detection does not guarantee the voice is neither post-edited nor a human impersonation.
hiya_voice_cloning_detection_rating_1: very likely not AI-generated. The absence of detection does not guarantee the voice is neither post-edited nor a human impersonation.
hiya_voice_cloning_detection_rating_0: inconclusive. Hiya.com was not able to examine the audio file properly. This can happen when there is excessive silence or excessive background noise present in the audio file.
hiya_cloning_additional_explanation_text: Explanation: The gauge score above represents the average detection rate for the analysed file. The left-side graph indicates whether the file is a composite with AI-generated fragments. It displays the detection rate in 4-second chunks across the file's duration. You can trim the file around suspected parts and re-analyse shorter segments to examine them and potentially improve detection accuracy.
hiya_scale_explanation_link: What do the gauge colors mean?
hiya_scale_modal_explanation_title: What do the gauge colors mean?
hiya_download_gauge_button: Download Gauge Chart as jpeg file
hiya_warning_partial_chunks_failed: Some parts of the audio had quality issues that may affect accuracy. For better results, use audio with:
hiya_error_all_chunks_failed: The audio analysis could not be completed due to audio quality issues. Please try with a different audio file that has:
